name: Two Castles
description:
In the light of day, things have shadows: the castle, the warriors...

There are 2 worlds in the game: normal and shadow.

You need to destroy the shadow castle.

But all the units that you send to attack the shadow castle have shadows that attack your castle.

Credits: teleport and tower attack use sprites from Pixel Adventure asset by Pixel Frog (https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/pixel-adventure-1)
